credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 158 x 68 cm (5 ft. 2 3/16 in. x 26 3/4 in.)
Repeat H: 55.2 cm (21 3/4 in.)
title: Funeral of Lord Nelson
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: copperplate and block-printed on plain weave
description: Panel of cotton printed in dark brown and red, probably a combination of copper plate and block printing.  Red appears to be added over dark brown.  Scenes from the death and burial of Lord Nelson with inscriptions.  Both selvages are present in which there are three blue threads.
name: Textile
